ingredients: 1 cup olive oil, 1 cup pomegranate juice, 1 cup rice vinegar,   +   1/4 cup white sugar, 2 tablespoons chopped shallots, 1   +   1/4 teaspoons chopped garlic, 1 teaspoon ground white pepper,   kosher salt to taste
nutrition: Total Fat 9g 12%, Saturated Fat 1g 6%, Sodium 17mg 1%, Total Carbohydrate 8g 3%, Total Sugars 7g, Vitamin C 0mg 2%, Calcium 1mg 0%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 4mg 0%
